name: L6 Game Project 07 - 'Steal it!'
description:
Steal it! is a platformer CFG (capture-the-flag) game made for two players using Unreal Engine 4. The aim of the game is to capture the purple diamond and hold on to it for the longest. But careful now! Your opponents' aim is to steal the item from you and earn himself points, leading him to victory.

Various items such as the Ion Cannon  or the Batteries can be used to gain advantage over your opponent and steal the win - but you need to pick them up first! 

Instructions:

Capture the purple item and earn points each 3 seconds for holding on to it.

The Ion Cannon once picked up allows the player to shoot a projectile that will freeze the enemy for a brief second on hit.

The Batteries speed you up temporarily, with the bonus decreasing slowly over time.

Controls: Player 1: WASD, Space to shoot Player 2: Arrow keys, R Ctrl to shoot _______________________________________________ Developed by:

Ionut Ciobanu 

(Group 07 Game Project)
